description: Paul Delvaux painted this monumental work after adopting Surrealism to give form to his inner world of fantasy and memories. Here, he transformed an episode from Jules Verne’s Journey to the Center of the Earth (1864) in which the professor and his nephew discover a prehistoric forest deep inside the earth. (The nephew, at the very left edge, bears a striking resemblance to the artist.)
title: The Awakening of the Forest
